about.summary: I am Program Manager experienced in leading multidisciplinary teams (up to 30 members), with more than 11 years of experience in the IT and Automotive industries. Skilled, innovative, and self-learner. Proficient in C, C++, and Python.

experience.title: Program Manager
summary: Build intelligent IoT Automotive applications using the AWS IoT services
Software development in Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS (Lambda, IAM, GreenGrass, EC2, S3)

experience.title: Senior Project Manager
summary: Working in close liaison with Automotive OEMs, and Tier 1 clients
Leading multidisciplinary teams (Requirements, Software, Testing), with headcount of 35+
Leading multicultural teams (Egypt, India, USA)
Primary point of contact for Software-related topics
V-Model methodology
ASPICE (SWE.1 - SWE.6)

experience.title: Project Manager
summary: Worked in close liaison with Automotive OEMs, Tier 1, and Tier 2 clients
Led multidisciplinary teams, with headcount of 14+
Participated in 6 project bids, maintaining a +80 pct. win rate (5 out of 6)
Implemented full project life cycle for 5 projects
Maintained project contribution margin above 30 pct.
Improved process adherence, reducing lead times by 80 pct.
Technical interviewer for C, C++, and Python developers

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
summary: Coded in Embedded C for ADAS ECUs (PAM, IPMB)
Analyzed Functional Safety (ISO 26262) Software Requirements

experience.title: Embedded Software Developer
summary: Developed drivers and applications for telematic devices (GSM, GPS, BLE)
Coded in Embedded C for STM32 MCUs (ARM)
Acted as Software integrator (git)

experience.title: Senior Embedded Tester
summary: Created a proprietary testing framework (Python, Go, MongoDB, REST, JSON, Bootstrap)
Automated automotive protocols testing (CAN, J1939, J1850, KWP2000, ISO-9141)
Telematics products testing (GSM, GPS)

experience.title: System Testing Trainee
summary: Implemented test automation scripts (Python, NI LabVIEW, and Agilent TestExec)
Tested Airbag Control Units (ACU) and Seatbelt Reminder (SBR) ECUs

Project Management: CMMI, ASPICE, MS Project, Jira, Confluence, Rally, TeamForge
Project life-cycle, V-Model, Leadership, Scrum (Scrum Master, Product Owner)
Cost Control, Time management, Effective communication, Risk assessment
Programming Languages: C, C++, Python, Go, Javascript, and Bash
Automotive and Embedded systems: CAN, UDS, J1939, ISO 15765, RP1210B, DOORS, Vector CANoe, ASPICE, MISRA-C
ARM, STM32, ST CubeMX, UART, SPI, I2C, BLE, USB HID, Yocto
Other: SQL, MongoDB, REST, JSON, HTTP, XML, HTML, Bootstrap, CSS
AWS S3, EC2, IoT, Greengrass, Kinesis
